short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to save the links of all all open tabs to read later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever have a thousand tabs open? Have you ever not wanted to close your browser so you don't lose all your tabs? Well lucky for you LinkSave is here. LinkSave is a chrome extension that saves all your tabs. LinkSave will save all of the tabs in the currently active chrome window into your bookmarks.  We created this app to help you keep track of all the tabs you want to read one day.  This extension is easy to use, and all it does is basically bookmark all your tabs (or the ones you select).  It will save everything in your bookmark folder under the "LinkSave" folder.
